# Pull Request (Docs)

**1. Type of Change:**
_What does this PR do? (Check one)_

- [ ] **Content Update** (e.g., New guide, fixing typos, text changes)
- [ ] **Bug Fix** (e.g., Fixing broken links, layout issues)
- [ ] **Conf/Structure** (e.g., `docs.json` updates, folder improvements)
- [ ] **New Feature** (e.g., Adding a new page or component)

**2. Related Issue:**
_Does this fix an existing issue? Please link it here (e.g., "Closes #24")._

>

**3. Summary of Changes:**
_Briefly explain what you changed and why. (e.g., "Added setup steps for Unbound," "Fixed typo in Intro")_

>

**4. Verification & Testing:**
_How did you verify these changes?_

- [ ] I have used the Mintlify CLI to preview locally (`mint dev`).
- [ ] I have checked that all new links work.
- [ ] (If UI related) I have checked how this looks on different screen sizes.

**5. Screenshots (Optional):**
_If this is a visual change, please paste a screenshot below to help us review it faster._

>

---

**Final Checklist:**

- [ ] I have read the [Contributing Guidelines](https://github.com/hapara-fail/docs/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md).
- [ ] My content follows the documentation style (clear, accurate, properly formatted).
